title: Host To Maou
alternative_title: ホストと魔王 ; Hosuto to Maou ; Host and Demon King
status: ホストと魔王 ; Hosuto to Maou ; Host and Demon King
description:
Description :
        Suddenly, the Demon King has arrived in Kabukichou from the Demon World. By chance, he enters a host club and encounters Yuusha, Kabukichou's No. 1 host, and challenges him to a contest...?! The strongest and most beautiful battle(?) comedy in history has begun...!!

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 1: Host And Demon King
